module.name: Digium Addons
module.changelog: *2.11.0.9* Request from DIGIUM *2.11.0.7* FREEPBX-8990 fix XSS in digium addons *2.11.0.6* Remove old depends *2.11.0.5* Add license file *2.11.0.4* Database abstraction fixes *2.11.0.3* Check if the extension has been loaded manually. That way we don't need dl() *2.11.0.2* Prevent page crashes if dl() doesn't exist. *2.11.0.1* FreePBX/Schmoozecom Release *0.1* initial commit
